description:
DIVI Quality Indicator 3: Patient-adapted Ventilation

blockquote.p: title: DIVI Quality Indicator 3a: Tidal Volume Limitation

div.p: Tidal volume should be limited to a maximum of 6 ml/kg ideal body weight in all invasive ventilated ICU patients with severe ARDS.

blockquote.p: title: DIVI Quality Indicator 3b: Plateau Pressure Limitation

div.p: Plateau pressure should be limited to a maximum of 30 cmH2O in all invasive ventilated ICU patients with severe ARDS.

blockquote.p: title: DIVI Quality Indicator 3b: Driving Pressure Limitation

div.p: Driving pressure should be limited to a maximum of 15 cmH2O in all invasive ventilated ICU patients with severe ARDS.

blockquote.p: title: Facultative Indicator 3d-1: PEEP adjusted in Dependence of FiO2=0.21-0.29

div.p: PEEP should be adjusted according to the table on ardsnet.org in dependence of the FiO2 required to achieve adequate oxygenation in all ventilated ICU patients with severe ARDS.
